Actions.Name: Unholy
Actions.Effects: Attack target is branded. This action can also be made as a close blast 1 melee attack

Actions.Name: Immaculate
Actions.Description: An ally in range 5 becomes Intangible until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Lift Burdens
Actions.Description: Self, or an ally in range 6 may fly 2.
Actions.Effects: Increase fly by +2 for each time this ability was used this turn.

Actions.Name: Lesser Decree
Actions.Description: The Emissary makes one of the following decrees, choosing a character in range 8. That character must follow the decree or else take [D]+[fray] divine damage and become stunned.

ListedItems.Name: Decree of Selfishness
ListedItems.Description: Do not use abilities that target allies this round.

ListedItems.Name: Decree of Paranoia
ListedItems.Description: End turn without being adjacent to any other characters.

ListedItems.Name: Decree of Rashness
ListedItems.Description: End turn adjacent to a foe.
